A World of Opportunities Expand your horizons and enrich your academic journey by studying, researching, and engaging globally through Vanderbilt’s Study Abroad programs. Why Study Abroad? Immersive Experience for Immersion Vanderbilt Study Abroad is one of Immersion Vanderbilt 's six pathways and qualifies as an immersive experience. World-Class Partnerships Benefit from our partnerships with prestigious universities and institutions worldwide, ensuring high-quality academic experiences wherever you go. Intercultural Experiences Many programs offer cultural engagement opportunities like homestays and language immersion, while others offer plenty of time for self-guided exploration. Personalized Support Our experienced advisors are here to guide you through every step of your journey-from choosing the right program to navigating logistics and cultural adaptation. 150+ Study Abroad Programs 40+ Countries 50% of undergraduates study abroad Study Abroad Programs Countries of undergraduates study abroad Reach Your Global Potential At Vanderbilt, we believe in the transformative power of global education. Study abroad allows you to remain enrolled at Vanderbilt but live and study overseas while completing your Vanderbilt degree requirements.  Whether you dream of studying in Paris, conducting research in Tokyo, or interning in Buenos Aires, our programs are designed to broaden your perspectives and deepen your understanding of the world

. Semester & Year Abroad Programs Immerse yourself in a semester- or academic year-long experience in a global city of your choice while earning credits toward your major or minor and utilizing your current financial package. Maymesters & Summer Programs Join a faculty-led Maymester or partner-led summer program that combines classroom learning with hands-on experiences in diverse cultural settings. Devin Laye | DIS Copenhagen | Fall '23 “My semester abroad in Denmark was all about discovery — of the world, of my passions, and most importantly of myself. Through experiential learning, immersing myself, and saying ‘yes’ to unique opportunities, I learned so much both in the classroom and in my everyday life.” Attend a Study Abroad OverVU Session Before scheduling an appointment with a Study Abroad advisor, attend an OverVU session to learn the basics of the Vanderbilt study abroad process. Connect with the Study Abroad Office Have questions or need more information? Contact our team—we're here to help you make the most of your global education experience at Vanderbilt University.
